challenge: Hand out 3 shots (of water for example...)
Swap one clothes with the person on your left
Make an embarrassing story and post it on one of your social networks
Send a message to the 3rd person who appears in your messages. The person on your right will write it.
Go through the next 3 rounds with your socks on your hands. Dance to a set song
Call a random number and hold the conversation for as long as possible.
